title: Car Price Prediction
description: This is a project made to build a Linear Regression model to predict car price

title: Image Classifier
description: This is a project made to  build a Python application that can train an image classifier on a flowers dataset, then predict new images using the trained model.

title: AI-summarizer
description: This is an AI-powered summarizer application built using React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and RapidAPI. The app takes long articles and generates clear, concise summaries, making reading more efficient.
